QuestData.Title: Compassion, Blade of Humility
QuestData.Description:
<You find a familiar sword impaled into one of the Forsworn corpses. The Paragon of Humility must have left it behind in pursuit of Lysonia.
It seems inert, as if all its anima has been used. Perhaps you could restore it to its usual glory.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Charge Compassion, Blade of Humility by killing manifestations.
